content: Job Title: Senior Shopify Developer About Us Bombay Blokes Digital Solutions is a founder-led digital marketing and web development agency built on innovation, accountability, and measurable growth. We partner with brands across industries to create powerful digital experiences through performance-driven design, technology, and strategy. Role Overview We are looking for a Senior Shopify Developer with 2-3 years of hands-on experience in theme customization, frontend development, and custom feature building. The ideal candidate should be comfortable working on Liquid, JavaScript, and Shopify APIs, capable of developing high-quality, scalable, and optimized eCommerce websites. Key Responsibilities: 1. Develop, customize, and maintain Shopify websites using Liquid, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. 2. Create and modify custom Shopify themes, sections, and templates as per client needs. 3.  Implement custom functionalities and integrations using Shopify APIs. 4. Collaborate with designers to translate UI/UX into clean, functional front-end code. 5. Optimize websites for speed, SEO, and performance. 6. Manage app integrations, troubleshoot issues, and ensure seamless functionality. 7. Handle store migrations, backups, and version updates with care. Required Skills & Experience: - 2–3 years of experience working on Shopify development (agency or project-based experience preferred). - Proficient in Liquid, JavaScript/jQuery, HTML, and CSS. - Experience with Shopify API, metafields, and theme architecture. - Strong understanding of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility. - Familiarity with Shopify apps and custom app configurations. - Knowledge of basic SEO principles, website performance, and frontend optimization. - Comfortable collaborating with design, content, and backend teams. - Strong problem-solving and debugging skills. Bonus Points For - Experience with Headless Shopify setups (React, Next.js, Hydrogen). - Familiarity with Git and version control workflows. - Understanding of payment gateway integrations and eCommerce data flow. - Exposure to analytics tracking and conversion optimization. Joining Date: Immediate Joiner Send us your best work/CV to shweta@bombayblokes.com
